name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
r1: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
r2: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn an 8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
r3: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 10% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
r4: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 12% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
r5: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 14% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
